triqpadA# gAyaqtrI gA#yaqtraM prA#tassavaqnaM prA#tassavaqna Eqva pra#tigaqrE CandA(gm)#siq saMpA#dayaqtyathOq tEjOq vai gA#yaqtrI tEja#H prAtaH savaqnaM tEja# Eqva prA#tassavaqna Aqtman dha#tta uqkthaM ~MvAqcItyA#haq mAddhya#ndinaq(gm)q sava#naM pratiqgIrya# caqtvAryEqtAnyaqkSharA#Niq catu#ShpadA triqShTup traiShTu#BaqM mAddhya#ndinaq(gm)q sava#naqM mAddhya#diMna Eqva sava#nE pratigaqrE CandA(gm)#siq saMpA#dayaqtyathO# indriqyaM ~Mvai triqShTugi#ndriqyaM mAddhya#diMnaq(gm)q
